where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( aca <* applied_classification_assignment | ('CLASSIFICATION_WITH_ATTRIBUTES_MIM.CLASS' IN TYPEOF(aca.assigned_class)) AND NOT( aca.role.name IN ['definitional','non-definitional','']) )) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( aca <* applied_classification_assignment | (aca.role.name IN ['definitional','non-definitional','']) AND NOT('CLASSIFICATION_WITH_ATTRIBUTES_MIM.CLASS' IN TYPEOF(aca.assigned_class)) )) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( aca <* applied_classification_assignment | ('CLASSIFICATION_WITH_ATTRIBUTES_MIM.CLASS_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF(aca.assigned_class)) AND (aca.role.name <> 'class system membership') )) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( aca <* applied_classification_assignment | (aca.role.name = 'class system membership') AND NOT ('CLASSIFICATION_WITH_ATTRIBUTES_MIM.CLASS_SYSTEM' IN TYPEOF(aca.assigned_class)) )) = 0
